# sdds-breadcrumb-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                  | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `current`  | `current`   | Boolean for the current link                 | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled` | `disabled`  | Toggle the disabled state for the breadcrumb | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `href`     | `href`      | Href for the link                            | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `linkText` | `link-text` | The text for the breadcrumb                  | `string`  | `undefined` |
